languages.text: "Ой, {name}, только херню пороть не надо! Я не соплячка, чтобы меня утешали. Ты знаешь, все знают, даже я снова знаю, хотя почти успела забыть — закрыли вопрос. Я приспособлюсь, соберу свою маску из осколков и склею заново. Просто придется смириться с тем, что тебя она уже не обманет".

"Oh, {name}, you don't need to say that groxshit to me! I'm not a snivelling kid that needs comforting. You know, everyone knows, even I know, but I almost managed to forget — the topic's closed. I'll adapt, pick up the pieces of my mask and stick them back together again. But it won't fool you anymore — you'll have to come to terms with that."
languages.original_text: "Ой, {name}, только херню пороть не надо! Я не соплячка, чтобы меня утешали. Ты знаешь, все знают, даже я снова знаю, хотя почти успела забыть — закрыли вопрос. Я приспособлюсь, соберу свою маску из осколков и склею заново. Просто придется смириться с тем, что тебя она уже не обманет".

You know, everyone knows, even I know, but I almost managed to forget — the topic's closed. I'll adapt, pick up the pieces of my mask and stick them back together again. But it won't fool you anymore — you'll have to come to terms with that."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “噢，{name}，你可用不着和我说这些屁话！我可不是什么哭鼻子的小孩，需要别人安慰。这件事情你知道，所有人都知道，就连我也知道，可我差一点就成功地把它忘了。这个话题不要再提了，我会适应过来的。我会把面具的碎片捡起来，一点一点粘回去。不过，我的面具再也骗不了你了，你必须接受这个事实。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, {name}, you don't need to say that groxshit to me! I'm not a snivelling kid that needs comforting. You know, everyone knows, even I know, but I almost managed to forget — the topic's closed. I'll adapt, pick up the pieces of my mask and stick them back together again. But it won't fool you anymore — you'll have to come to terms with that."

traits.locale_text: “噢，{name}，你可用不着和我说这些屁话！我可不是什么哭鼻子的小孩，需要别人安慰。这件事情你知道，所有人都知道，就连我也知道，可我差一点就成功地把它忘了。这个话题不要再提了，我会适应过来的。我会把面具的碎片捡起来，一点一点粘回去。不过，我的面具再也骗不了你了，你必须接受这个事实。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ、{name}様、そんな蜥蜴牛のたわごとみたいなことを言わないでよ！あたしは慰めを必要とするような洟垂れ小僧じゃないんだ。みんな知ってる、あたしだって。でも忘れかけていただけ…この話はおしまい。あたしは適応して、仮面の破片を拾って、またくっつけるよ。でも、もうあんたを騙すことはできないね…あんたには、そのことを受け入れてもらうしかないんだ」
languages.original_text: "Oh, {name}, you don't need to say that groxshit to me! I'm not a snivelling kid that needs comforting. You know, everyone knows, even I know, but I almost managed to forget — the topic's closed. I'll adapt, pick up the pieces of my mask and stick them back together again. But it won't fool you anymore — you'll have to come to terms with that."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、{name}様、そんな蜥蜴牛のたわごとみたいなことを言わないでよ！あたしは慰めを必要とするような洟垂れ小僧じゃないんだ。みんな知ってる、あたしだって。でも忘れかけていただけ…この話はおしまい。あたしは適応して、仮面の破片を拾って、またくっつけるよ。でも、もうあんたを騙すことはできないね…あんたには、そのことを受け入れてもらうしかないんだ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Ay, {name}, no me diga esas tonterías! No soy una mocosa que necesita consuelo. Usted lo sabe, todo el mundo lo sabe, hasta yo lo sé; pero estoy a punto de olvidarlo, el tema está cerrado. Me adaptaré, recogeré los pedazos de mi máscara y los volveré a pegar. Aunque a usted ya no le engañará; más vale que se haga a la idea».
languages.original_text: "Oh, {name}, you don't need to say that groxshit to me! I'm not a snivelling kid that needs comforting. You know, everyone knows, even I know, but I almost managed to forget — the topic's closed. I'll adapt, pick up the pieces of my mask and stick them back together again. But it won't fool you anymore — you'll have to come to terms with that."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ay, {name}, no me diga esas tonterías! No soy una mocosa que necesita consuelo. Usted lo sabe, todo el mundo lo sabe, hasta yo lo sé; pero estoy a punto de olvidarlo, el tema está cerrado. Me adaptaré, recogeré los pedazos de mi máscara y los volveré a pegar. Aunque a usted ya no le engañará; más vale que se haga a la idea».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Oh, {name}, vous pouvez m'épargner ces conneries ! Je suis pas une gamine qui pleurniche et qu'il faut réconforter. Vous le savez, tout le monde le sait, même moi, je le sais, mais j'avais presque réussi à l'oublier... Le sujet est clos. Je vais m'adapter, ramasser les morceaux de mon masque et les recoller un à un. Mais vous ne vous y laisserez plus prendre, et ça, vous allez devoir l'accepter. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, {name}, you don't need to say that groxshit to me! I'm not a snivelling kid that needs comforting. You know, everyone knows, even I know, but I almost managed to forget — the topic's closed. I'll adapt, pick up the pieces of my mask and stick them back together again. But it won't fool you anymore — you'll have to come to terms with that."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, {name}, vous pouvez m'épargner ces conneries ! Je suis pas une gamine qui pleurniche et qu'il faut réconforter. Vous le savez, tout le monde le sait, même moi, je le sais, mais j'avais presque réussi à l'oublier... Le sujet est clos. Je vais m'adapter, ramasser les morceaux de mon masque et les recoller un à un. Mais vous ne vous y laisserez plus prendre, et ça, vous allez devoir l'accepter. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Oh, {name}, erzählt mir nicht diesen Grox-Scheiß! Ich bin kein wehleidiges Kind, das getröstet werden muss. Ihr wisst es, alle wissen es, sogar ich weiß es, aber ich habe es fast vergessen – das Thema ist beendet. Ich werde mich anpassen, die Scherben meiner Maske einsammeln und sie wieder zusammensetzen. Aber ich werde Euch nichts mehr vormachen – gewöhnt Euch besser daran."
languages.original_text: "Oh, {name}, you don't need to say that groxshit to me! I'm not a snivelling kid that needs comforting. You know, everyone knows, even I know, but I almost managed to forget — the topic's closed. I'll adapt, pick up the pieces of my mask and stick them back together again. But it won't fool you anymore — you'll have to come to terms with that."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, {name}, erzählt mir nicht diesen Grox-Scheiß! Ich bin kein wehleidiges Kind, das getröstet werden muss. Ihr wisst es, alle wissen es, sogar ich weiß es, aber ich habe es fast vergessen – das Thema ist beendet. Ich werde mich anpassen, die Scherben meiner Maske einsammeln und sie wieder zusammensetzen. Aber ich werde Euch nichts mehr vormachen – gewöhnt Euch besser daran."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "{name}, bana böyle groks boklarıyla gelmek zorunda değilsin! Teselliye ihtiyaç duyan sümüklü bir çocuk değilim. Sen biliyorsun, herkes biliyor, ben de biliyorum ama neredeyse unutmayı başarmıştım. Konu kapandı. Adapte olurum, maskemin parçalarını toplayıp tekrar yapıştırırım. Ancak bir daha seni kandıramam. Bununla barışık olman gerekecek."
languages.original_text: "Oh, {name}, you don't need to say that groxshit to me! I'm not a snivelling kid that needs comforting. You know, everyone knows, even I know, but I almost managed to forget — the topic's closed. I'll adapt, pick up the pieces of my mask and stick them back together again. But it won't fool you anymore — you'll have to come to terms with that."

traits.locale_text: "Ah {name}, bana böyle groks boklarıyla gelmek zorunda değilsin! Teselliye ihtiyaç duyan sümüklü bir çocuk değilim. Sen de biliyorsun, herkes de biliyor, ben de biliyorum ama neredeyse unutmayı başarmıştım ve konu kapandı. Adapte olurum, maskemin parçalarını toplayıp tekrar yapıştırırım. Ama bir daha seni kandıramayacak. Bununla barışık olman gerekecek."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
